name: Babysitting Party
overview: Babysitting Party offers a variety of 30 mini-games that can be played head-to-head or cooperatively among your family or with your friends. Live a great adventure if you play alone or have fun with your friends, up to 4 players. Wii Remote gestures are intuitive, making the game easy to pick up and play, and some games can be played with the Wii Balance Board. You will have to play indoor & outdoor mini-games following the typical day of a baby and his/her babysitter, and prove that you are the best babysitter, alone or with your friends.
